= [[size 150%]]{{**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6057 SCP-6057]** - Se√±or Boom}}[[/size]]

= //(Written by [[user Uncle Nicolini]] and drawn by [[user winkwonkboi]].)//

@@ @@

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
**__Artist's Commentary__**

Fuck, this looks so beautiful.

The story behind this artwork begins when I read [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/spirit-of-the-forest 'Spirit Of The Forest',] a tale written by the same author. It tugged on my heartstrings so much that I decided to sit down and draw an article from their discography. After scrolling through their author page for a brief while, I landed on this one.

I remembered reading it before, and I remembered reading through the dialogue thinking how raw it felt. It was like experiencing an actual conversation from an outside perspective (which makes sense given the context of it). I almost forgot this was about a talking bomb. In a way, it felt rather endearing, to the point I could imagine everything that's happening in the narrative. Very vividly, too.

Massive props to Nico for both of these articles. Pretty good shit, I do say. And to everyone else reading in the month this is coming out, happy pride month. New article coming soon.
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
